TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LiteralControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class LiteralControl Inherits Control Implements ITextControl
public ref class LiteralControl : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type LiteralControl = class inherit Control interface ITextControl

summary.span: 表示 HTML 元素、文本和 ASP.NET 页中不需要在服务器上处理的其他任何字符串。

span.span: Represents HTML elements, text, and any other strings in an ASP.NET page that do not require processing on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 编译了所有 HTML 元素和可读文本, 这些元素不需要将服务器端处理到此类的实例。ASP.NET compiles all HTML elements and readable text that do not require server-side processing into instances of this class. 例如, 在其开始标记中不包含`runat="server"`特性/值对的 HTML 元素将编译为一个对象。For example, an HTML element that does not contain a `runat="server"` attribute/value pair in its opening tag is compiled into a object. 对象不维护视图状态, 因此必须在每个请求时重新创建对象的内容。 objects do not maintain view state, so the contents of a object must be recreated on each request. 文本控件表现为文本占位符, 这意味着您可以从文本控件提取文本, 并通过父级的 属性从父服务器控件的集合中删除文本控件。Literal controls behave as text holders, meaning that you can extract text from the literal control and remove the literal control from the parent server control's collection through the parent's property. 因此, 当您开发从类派生的自定义控件时, 请确保您的控件将执行任何所需的预处理步骤, 而不是使用对方法的调用来完成这些操作。Therefore, when you develop a custom control derived from the class, make sure your control performs any required preprocessing steps itself, rather than using a call to the method to accomplish them. 通常, 您需要这样做来改进 Web 应用程序的响应时间。Typically, you would do this to improve the response time of your Web application. 您可以使用 或方法以编程方式在页面或服务器控件中添加或删除文本控件。You can add or remove literal controls from a page or server control programmatically using the or the method, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 重写方法时使用重载的构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the overloaded constructor when overriding the method. 此代码将两个新对象和一个 Web 服务器控件添加到当前服务器控件的属性。The code adds two new objects and a Web server control to the current server control's property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/CS/controlcreatechildcontrols.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/VB/controlcreatechildcontrols.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类包含要在请求的 ASP.NET 页上呈现的文本字符串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains a literal string to be rendered on the requested ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个`CustLiteralControlClass` 扩展类的类。The following code example creates a class, `CustLiteralControlClass`, that extends the class. 它使用未指定`myLiteralControlClass1` 对象文本的构造函数创建一个名为的类的实例。It creates an instance of the class named `myLiteralControlClass1` by using the constructor that does not specify the text of the object. 创建对象后, 属性用于设置它包含的文本。After the object is created, the property is used to set the text that it contains. [!code-csharp[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/CS/customliteralcontrol.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/VB/customliteralcontrol.vb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用构造函数创建类的两个实例。The following code example creates two instances of the class using the constructor. 这两个实例呈现 H3 HTML 元素的开始标记和结束标记, 并包括要在 H3 标记中显示的文本。The two instances render opening and closing tags for an H3 HTML element, and include the text to display within the H3 tags. summary.span: 为 类的当前实例创建 对象。

span.span: Creates an object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 , 对象只包含文本, 而不包含子服务器控件。By default, objects contain only text and no child server controls. 如果要更改此行为, 必须重写此方法。If you want to change this behavior, you must override this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写方法以创建类的实例, 而不是类的实例。The following code example overrides the method to create an instance of the class rather than an instance of the class. summary.span: 将 对象的内容写入 ASP.NET 页。

span.span: Writes the content of the object to the ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建自定义服务器控件并想要将特定 HTML 或文本呈现给客户端时, 可以通过将属性的值传递给方法来提高控件的性能, 而不是调用方法。When you create a custom server control and want to render specific HTML or text to a client, you can improve the performance of the control by passing the value of the property to the method rather than calling the method.
